segments.text: So , Casey , how are things going with the photos for the press kit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I ’ Ve been meaning to talk to you about that . I might need to ask for an extension on that deadline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ Ve had over a month to get this finalized ! Why are things delayed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the thing is , we ran into a lot of problems . . .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not looking for excuses here . I just want to get this finished on time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , and I apologize for the delay . But some things were just beyond my control . I had trouble booking the photographer , and then Michael was sick for three weeks , so I couldn ’ t include him in the photos , and the design team lost all the files , so I had to re-do the pictures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not going to put this off any longer , Casey ! I want those photos ASAP !
segments.speaker: S1
